content: I am a second year Computer Science PhD student at Stony Brook University, advised by Amir Rahmati. My research falls under the umbrella of Adversarial Machine Learning. More specifically, I investigate techniques that can improve robustness of visual recognition models against adversarial attacks.

title: Pratik Vaishnavi

title: Transferable Adversarial Robustness using Adversarially Trained Autoencoders
